Plot: A minor league baseball player has to spend thirty million dollars in thirty days, in order to inherit three hundred million dollars. However, he's not allowed to tell anyone about the deal.
Title: Brewster's Millions
Actors: Richard Pryor, John Candy, Lonette McKee, Stephen Collins
Writer: George Barr McCutcheon (based on the novel by), Herschel Weingrod (screenplay), Timothy Harris (screenplay)
